title: POSQA: Probe the World Models of LLMs with Size Comparisons. (arXiv:2310.13394v1 [cs.CL])
abstract: Embodied language comprehension emphasizes that language understanding is not solely a matter of mental processing in the brain but also involves interactions with the physical and social environment. With the explosive growth of Large Language Models (LLMs) and their already ubiquitous presence in our daily lives, it is becoming increasingly necessary to verify their real-world understanding. translated_title: POSQA：使用尺寸比较探索LLMs的世界模型
translated_abstract: 具身化语言理解强调语言理解不仅仅是大脑中的心理处理问题，还涉及与物理和社会环境的互动。随着大型语言模型（LLMs）的爆炸性增长和它们已经普遍存在于我们的日常生活中，越来越有必要验证它们在现实世界中的理解能力。受认知理论的启发，我们提出了POSQA：一个带有简单尺寸比较问题的物体大小问答数据集，以检验最新LLMs的具身理解的极端性并分析其潜在机制。我们发现即使是今天的最大LLMs在零-shot情景下表现不佳，并通过先进的提示技术和外部知识增强推动了它们的极限。此外，我们研究了它们的现实世界理解主要是来自上下文信息还是内部权重，并分析了提示对其影响。
tldr: POSQA是一个用来探索LLMs在具身理解方面的物体大小问答数据集，研究了LLMs在零-shot情景下的表现，通过推动技术和外部知识增强了它们的极限，同时分析了其现实世界理解的来源和提示的影响。
en_tdlr: POSQA is a dataset for exploring the embodied comprehension of LLMs through physical object size question answering. It investigates the performance of LLMs in zero-shot scenarios, pushes their limits with advanced prompting techniques and external knowledge augmentation, and analyzes the sources of their real-world comprehension and the impact of prompts.
